text: Matej Marin (2 July 1980 - 5 September 2021) was a Slovenian professional racing cyclist. He rode professionally between 2003 and 2015 for the Perutnina Ptuj and Felbermayrâ€“Simplon Wels teams. He rode at the 2013 UCI Road World Championships. Marin died on 5 September 2021, at the age of 41. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Slovenian sportspeople Category:Cyclists
